beef.name: Fried Beef
beef.description: Fried beef is very delicious and very light on the stomach.

beef.name: Boiled Beef
beef.description: Boiled beef is very healthy, however, it is not that tasty.

beef.name: Grilled Beef
beef.description: On top of a coal fire that is very hot, this kind is cooked and added to it are hot spices.

beef.name: Alfredo Beef
beef.description: This is the easiest, creamiest beef alfredo you will ever make.

beef.name: Lemon Pepper Beef
beef.description: This lemon pepper beef makes beef exciting again.

beef.name: Roast Beef
beef.description: You need this classic beef recipe in your arsenal.

beef.name: Biryani Beef
beef.description: Beef biryani is such an easy and delicious dinner. Served over fluffy white rice, it’s hard to resist.

beef.name: Tamale Pie
beef.description: A layer of cornbread topped with cheesy shredded beef.

sushi.name: Nigiri Sushi
sushi.description: Nigiri sushi consists of a small ball of vinegared sushi rice topped with various fresh ingredients like fish, seafood, or egg.

sushi.name: Maki Sushi
sushi.description: Maki sushi, also known as sushi rolls, are made by wrapping sushi rice and fillings in a sheet of seaweed (nori) and cutting it into bite-sized pieces.

sushi.name: Sashimi Sushi
sushi.description: Sashimi is thinly sliced, raw fish or seafood served without rice. It highlights the natural flavors of the fish and is often served with soy sauce and wasabi.

sushi.name: Uramaki Sushi
sushi.description: Uramaki sushi, also called inside-out rolls, are sushi rolls with the rice on the outside and the seaweed and fillings on the inside. They often have a layer of sesame seeds or fish roe on the outside.

sushi.name: Temaki Sushi
sushi.description: Temaki sushi, or hand rolls, are cone-shaped sushi rolls wrapped in nori and filled with sushi rice, fish, vegetables, and other toppings.

sushi.name: Chirashi Sushi
sushi.description: Chirashi sushi is a bowl of sushi rice topped with a variety of sashimi, vegetables, and other ingredients, often served beautifully arranged in a colorful manner.

sushi.name: Inari Sushi
sushi.description: Inari sushi is made by filling seasoned sushi rice into pockets of fried tofu (aburaage). The sweet and savory tofu pockets give a unique flavor to the sushi.

sushi.name: Naruto Sushi
sushi.description: Naruto sushi, also known as narutomaki or fish cake, is a colorful spiral-shaped fish cake commonly used as a decorative topping for sushi rolls and bowls.
